text: The lawn bowls competition at the 1950 British Empire Games took place in Auckland, New Zealand from 4-11 February 1950. ==Medallists== {| |- |Singles | James Pirret | Albert Newton | Lionel Garnett |- |Pairs | Phil Exelby and Robert Henry | W. Gibb and H. J. van Zyl | Leslie Brown and James Poulton |- |Fours | Alfred Blumberg Herbert Currer Harry Atkinson Norman Snowy Walker | Charles Cordaiy James Cobley John Cobley Len Knight | Fred Russell Arthur Engebretsen Noel Jolly Pete Skoglund |} == Results == ===Men's Singles - title: Lawn bowls at the 1950 British Empire Games
